perennial_investments.name: Perennial Investments
perennial_investments.description: Your wealth from your many lives are going to give you gold daily. You'll gain 1 gold per day per levels of Perennial Investments.

accelerated_perception_ii.name: Accelerated Perception II
accelerated_perception_ii.description: Increases Game Speed by x0.1 for each level. Stacks multiplicatively with Accelerated Perception

chronic_insight_ii.name: Chronic Insight II
chronic_insight_ii.description: Reduces the scaling of exp required by 1% (Additively) per each level. Stacks with other Chronic Insight skills.

temporal_adaptation_ii.name: Temporal Adaptation II
temporal_adaptation_ii.description:
Your body adapts to the power of time better.

Decreases rebirths required to obtain temporal essence by 1 and Lifespan increases by 10 years for each level

eternal_learnings_ii.name: Eternal Learnings II
eternal_learnings_ii.description: Break the limit of leveling up once with overflow experience. Overflowing experience will level up Job, Trainings, and Skills more than once. The amount of level ups depends on its level.

causality_manipulation.name: Causality Manipulation
causality_manipulation.description: Change the timeline to survive. Gain miracles for every 50 luck level for every life. Dying during explorations consumes a miracle which will prevent your death.

echoes_of_time.name: Echoes of Time
echoes_of_time.description:
Hear echoes from yourselves in different time. Bosses defeated will reduce their future danger by the number of times you have defeated the boss. The danger reduction will persist through rebirths and regressions. 

 New Boss Danger = Boss Danger - (boss lifetime defeat amount * (0.1 x echoes of time levels))

time_split.name: Time Split
time_split.description: Be at two places at once. Different from doppelganger. You can explore and do jobs at the same time.

destined_journey.name: Destined Journey
destined_journey.description: Fulfill your destiny of becoming a hero and make your automations easier. Exploration can be automated.

timestream_butler.name: Timestream Butler
timestream_butler.description: This butler will help you adjust your way of life based on the budget you give it. Lifestyle can be automated.

library_of_time.name: Monolith of Ages
library_of_time.description: Obtain a monolith containing knowledge that will resist regression. Technologies will persists through regressions.
